engineName.title: Engine Name
engineName.description: General short name for this engine, only used as an identifier

appliesTo.title: Applies To
appliesTo.description: This section defines the region/locales/application information for where a search engine is available, and any specifics for that region/locale/application. If there are no entries in the list, it is considered to be included everywhere

telemetryId.title: Telemetry Id
telemetryId.description: The telemetry Id as used for some of SEARCH_COUNTS telemetry.

name.title: Name
name.description: The application this applies to (default/not specified is everywhere)

branches.title: Branches
branches.description: Which branches this belongs to (not set = everywhere)

minversion.title: Minimum Version
minversion.description: The minimum version this applies to

maxversion.title: Maxium Version
maxversion.description: The maximum version this applies to

default.title: Default Status
default.description: Whether or not this engine should be default.

defaultPrivate.title: Default Status (PBM)
defaultPrivate.description: Whether or not this engine should be default in private browsing mode.

orderHint.title: Order Hint
orderHint.description: A hint to the display order (higher is a higer rank)

sapCodes.title: Search Access Point Codes
sapCodes.description: Codes for the search access points.

any.title: Any
any.description: SAP code that is used for all access points (overrides the others).

contextMenu.title: Context Menu
contextMenu.description: SAP code for searches from the context menu.

homePage.title: Home page
homePage.description: SAP code for searches from the home page.

keyword.title: Keyword
keyword.description: SAP code for searches via keywords.

newTab.title: New Tab
newTab.description: SAP code for searches from the new tab page.

searchBar.title: Search Bar
searchBar.description: SAP code for searches from the search bar.

codes.title: Codes
codes.description: Various codes for the search engines

searchUrlGetExtraCodes.title: Search URL Get Extra codes
searchUrlGetExtraCodes.description: Extra params (for SAP codes) for the search URL (e.g. 'pc=foo').

searchFormExtraCodes.title: Search Form Extra codes
searchFormExtraCodes.description: Extra params (for SAP codes) for the search form URL (e.g. 'pc=foo').

telemetryId.title: Telemetry Id
telemetryId.description: The telemetry Id as used for some of SEARCH_COUNTS telemetry.

webExtensionId.title: WebExtension Id
webExtensionId.description: The identifier (local part) of the associated WebExtension

webExtensionVersion.title: WebExtension Version
webExtensionVersion.description: The version of the WebExtension to use

webExtensionLocale.title: WebExtension Locale
webExtensionLocale.description: Overrides the WebExtension locales and specifies to use a particular one. Ideally this should only be used when really necessary, otherwise considered deprecated.

included.title: Included Locations
included.description: The locations to which this section applies. Note: Regions and Locales are 'and'ed together.

everywhere.title: Everywhere
everywhere.description: Set to true to signify that this is included everywhere.

excluded.title: Excluded Locations
excluded.description: The locations to which this section applies. Note: Regions and Locales are 'and'ed together.
